Text:
Works!  But its the trial version.

And must be installed thru unpacking the *.deb file, not just dragging the file to dynamic library folder.

i installed .deb using ifile. once installed i swapped the dylib with this one.

there is no indication that it is the trial version. everything works fine for me
I agree with dandymike. This appears to be legit, thanks a lot!

I installed it by placing the .deb file in the following AutoInstall directory, then rebooted

var/root/Media/Cydia/AutoInstall

Then I replaced the iRealSMS_dylib.dylib with the provided one. Attempted to launch the app, it just opened, displayed the white screen for about 2-3 seconds and crashed.

Any ideas why this is happening? Been using the 3.0.0.0 version on iOS 3.1.3 on an iPhone 3GS  and it has been working as expected.
